mapper.select: SELECT e.game_title, e.game_price, e.game_sub_startDate, e.game_sub_endDate, d.purchase_date, f.sg_name, f.sg_level FROM game_content AS e LEFT JOIN game_purchase AS d ON e.user_no = d.user_no LEFT JOIN study_group AS f ON e.user_no = f.user_no ORDER BY e.game_no DESC LIMIT #{JTwoPageList}, #{JTwoAmount};
SELECT count(*) as total FROM game_content AS e INNER JOIN game_purchase AS d ON e.user_no = d.user_no INNER JOIN study_group AS f ON e.user_no = f.user_no ;
